attributes.action: The F A Cup should be free to watch on TV
attributes.background:
The F A Cup will be on TNT Sports from Season 25/26 no longer free. End of a era.
Not thinking of the fans that can't afford to go to matches. Money Money taking over the beautiful game keep the F A Cup FREE ON TV.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657275
